title: Covid-19 Vaccine Effectiveness
content:
Updates summarizing the results of CDC led vaccine effectiveness evaluations are provided on
COVID Data Tracker
.
Guiding principles for monitoring vaccine effectiveness
The goals of CDCâ€™s COVID-19 vaccine effectiveness program are to evaluate existing COVID-19 vaccines and inform decisions by the
U.S. Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices
regarding COVID-19 vaccine policy. CDC accomplishes these goals by:
